title: Ben Carson Says Holocaust Would Have Been ‘Greatly Diminished’ if Jews Had Guns
text:
Ben Carson Says Holocaust Would Have Been ‘Greatly Diminished’ if Jews Had Guns 
Published By: Time - Today 
Carson has faced scrutiny for multiple statements about guns this week, including a recent story about a robbery in a Baltimore Popeyes...
